subject: AI & Agents
title: Will AI Replace All Jobs?
description: Learn Will AI Replace All Jobs? in one minute.

hook.text: A viral headline: 'AI will eliminate 300 million jobs.' But history tells a more nuanced story.

buildup.text: Every technology wave â€” farming, factories, computers â€” was predicted to end work. None did.

discovery.text: AI automates tasks, not entire jobs. Most jobs are bundles of many different tasks.

twist.text: The ATM was supposed to kill bank teller jobs. Instead, cheaper branches meant more tellers overall.

climax.text: AI will transform jobs dramatically, but mass unemployment requires ignoring all of economic history.

punchline.text: Jobs change. Work evolves. Human need for purpose persists.
